summary: Small modifications to facial structure of the NPC Hadvar.
descriptionHtml:
This mod makes changes to legionary Hadvar to give him an older, weathered appearance. More variations included, and more to come.

To install, simply extract into your \"steamapps/common/Skyrim/Data\" directory. 

Compatibility : No issues known. Compatible with most, if not all, mods, so long as they do not alter Hadvar\'s facial features.   

Comments/questions/critiques/requests welcome.  

- WaywardKnight
author: Wayward Knight
